thread.title: Stars defenseman Jason Demers suspended 2 games
thread.title_full: Stars defenseman Jason Demers suspended 2 games

author: Monster storm makes landfall as category 5 in Mexico
title: Stars defenseman Jason Demers suspended 2 games
text:
Stars defenseman Jason Demers suspended 2 games Associated Press 16 hrs ago Â© (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar Dallas Stars' Johnny Oduya (47) celebrates his goal with teammate Jason Demers (4) during the first period of an NHL hockey game against the Pittsburgh Penguins in Pittsburgh, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar) NEW YORK (AP) -- Dallas Stars defenseman Jason Demers was suspended for two games without pay by the NHL on Friday for elbowing Pittsburgh Penguins forward Nick Bonino.
Demers received a major penalty and game misconduct for elbowing in the third period of the Stars' 4-1 victory at Pittsburgh on Thursday night. The suspension will cost Demers $36,559.
AdChoices Demers has a goal, three assists and 17 penalty minutes in seven games this season.
